chetichand2025.message:
🚩 Om Satnam Sakhi | Jai Shri Ram 🚩

**March 30, 2025 (Sunday) - Cheti Chand / Hindu New Year / New Samvatsar 2082**

Hindu Chaitra Shukla Pratipada Vikram Samvat 2082 (March 30, 2025), Sunday, marks the beginning of the Hindu New Year and Cheti Chand! On this auspicious day, be sure to follow these traditions:

(1). 🦺 Wear yellow or saffron-colored clothes

(2). Apply a tilak 🔶 on your forehead

(3). Prepare sweet dishes or sweet rice at home

(4). 🚩 Hoist a saffron flag on your rooftop 🚩

(5). Light 5-7 diyas at home and outside at night

(6). Decorate the entrance of your home

(7). Create rangoli designs

(8). Adorn your doorway with flower and leaf torans

Wishing all Sanatanis a very Happy Hindu New Year and Cheti Chand! Heartfelt greetings to all! 🚩💐

🙋‍♂️🔆🚩 Let us all greet and congratulate each other on Hindu New Year 2082 and Cheti Chand! 🙋‍♂️🔆🚩

 Shri Amrapur Asthan, Jaipur
